Text:
plz download apk from android market it's free

and put com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftR2HM to Android/obb

few tips if u see invalid license .then remove all.make sure ur internet connection is on.then install first   Real Football 2012 v1.5.4.apk run it and download 1mb and cancel download. then go to Android/obb/ 
and past with replace .done don't restart ur device:) run RF2012 .enjoy
